text: Hi! I'm trying to get the yellow area on this page to appear as a banner, i.e. stretch across the whol site page. Can someone help? <https://www.thinkinkpr.com/industries-thinkink?hs_preview=mbErIULm-9197909103>
why aren’t blog posts and pages separated in the link field for custom modules? it means i can’t reduce the supported URL types  in that way. kinda defeated the purpose of adding the supported types

example: if I pick supported URL types: blog

All I get for results are the listing pages, I can’t get the posts.

If I do Content, I get both posts and pages….
I’m using the blog_subscribe hubl to display the email subscription - but can’t figureout how to edit the placeholder text, any advice?
under forms find your blog subscription form for that blog.
the blog subscribe tag is just an abstraction of the form tag basically
Interesting, I will look, thanks again Jon
